name: Green Papaya
properties: Low glycemic compared to ripe papaya
benefits: Green papaya is a water-rich vegetable (when unripe) with approximately 88-90% water content. Featured in Thai cuisine, it provides volume and hydration while being very low in calories. The digestive enzymes in green papaya may aid in nutrient absorption and digestion.
amount: 1 large green papaya per salad serving (serves 4)

quotes: 1 large green papaya, peeled, de-seeded and grated
If you can't get hold of green papaya, you could try cucumber and/or shredded cabbage.
